page.title: 17School.
page.content: The School was built in the middle of the nineteenth century and was a two-teacher school with about 50 pupils.At that time the pupils remained at the same school until they were 14. The roll fluctuated between 50 and 30 pupils, becoming eventually a one-teacher school. However, a few years later, with the influx of children, it again became a two-teacher school. From August,1985, the school will be once again a one-teacher school with a roll standing at 16. The school is sometimes closed for a few days in winter because of snow. None of the children need transport. The atmosphere of the school is pleasant and relaxed and visitors are made very welcome.
